member.name: M:Moses.Web.HttpHelpers.ResolveUrl(System.String)
member.summary:
Returns a site relative HTTP path from a partial path starting out with a ~. Same syntax that ASP.Net internally supports but this method can be used outside of the Page framework.
Works like Control.ResolveUrl including support for ~ syntax but returns an absolute URL.
member.param: Any Url including those starting with ~

member.name: M:Moses.Web.HttpHelpers.ResolveServerUrl(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
This method returns a fully qualified absolute server Url which includes the protocol, server, port in addition to the server relative Url.
Works like Control.ResolveUrl including support for ~ syntax but returns an absolute URL.
member.param: Any Url, either App relative or fully qualified
if true forces the url to use https

member.name: M:Moses.Web.HttpHelpers.ResolveServerUrl(System.String)
member.summary:
This method returns a fully qualified absolute server Url which includes the protocol, server, port in addition to the server relative Url.
It work like Page.ResolveUrl, but adds these to the beginning. This method is useful for generating Urls for AJAX methods
member.param: Any Url, either App relative or fully qualified

member.name: M:Moses.Web.Extensions.JqGridDataHelper.ToJqGridData``1(System.Linq.IQueryable{``0},System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Object)
member.summary: Converts a queryable expression into a format suitable for the JqGrid component, when serialized to JSON. Use this method when returning data that the JqGrid component will fetch via AJAX. Take the result of this method, and then serialize to JSON. This method will also apply paging to the data.
member.typeparam: The type of the element in baseList. Note that this type should be an anonymous type or a simple, named type with no possibility of a cycle in the object graph. The default JSON serializer will throw an exception if the object graph it is serializing contains cycles.
member.param: The list of records to display in the grid.
A 1-based index indicating which page the grid is about to display.
The maximum number of rows which the grid can display at the moment.
A string expression containing a column name and an optional ASC or DESC. You can, separate multiple column names as with SQL.
The value which the user typed into the search box, if any. Can be null/empty.
An array of strings containing the names of properties in the element type of baseList which should be considered when searching the data for searchQuery.
Arbitrary data to be returned to the grid along with the row data. Leave null if not using. Must be serializable to JSON!
member.returns: A structure containing all of the fields required by the JqGrid. You can then call a JSON serializer, passing this result.

member.name: P:Moses.Web.Extensions.JqGridData.Total
member.summary: The number of pages which should be displayed in the paging controls at the bottom of the grid.

member.name: P:Moses.Web.Extensions.JqGridData.Page
member.summary: The current page number which should be highlighted in the paging controls at the bottom of the grid.

member.name: P:Moses.Web.Extensions.JqGridData.Records
member.summary: The total number of records in the entire data set, not just the portion returned in Rows.

member.name: P:Moses.Web.Extensions.JqGridData.Rows
member.summary: The data that will actually be displayed in the grid.

member.name: P:Moses.Web.Extensions.JqGridData.UserData
member.summary: Arbitrary data to be returned to the grid along with the row data. Leave null if not using. Must be serializable to JSON!
